title: pangu
author: pangu
content: "Bitcoin Price Prediction Bull Run. Crypto Defeats Banks?! Vitalik Buterin in Decentralized No Matter What Film V2"-> Documentary features Vitalik Buterin (creator of Ethereum), Paolo Ardoino(CEO Tether.io), Yat Siu (Chairman Animoca Brands), Adam Back (inventor of proof-of-work, referenced by Satoshi in Bitcoin white paper), and many other top crypto entrepreneurs, influencers, VCs.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U1zlwTejfPg
